points.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
points.status:
The UPS Technology agreement states "You also agree that UPS may 
share personal information provided by You with third parties, including service providers, affiliates, resellers, joint 
marketing partners, franchisees, Your contacts upon Your request, government agencies, and other third parties such 
as shippers, consignees, or third-party payers and recipients (collectively, the “Recipients”)"

points.title: This service retains rights to your content even after you stop using your account
points.status:
The UPS Technology Agreement states that "General Terms and Conditions Articles 1, 7-9, and 12; and Sections 
4.1, 6.5, and 6.6; the Articles and those Sections of the End User Rights identified in End User Rights Section 10.3; 
and the Articles and those Sections of the Information and General Use Policies identified in Article 4 of the 
Information and General Use Policies shall survive the termination of this Agreement for any reason. "

points.title: You waive your right to a class action.
points.status:
The UPS Technology Agreement states that "Any arbitration under this Agreement will take place on an individual basis; class, mass, consolidated or combined actions or arbitrations or proceeding as a private attorney general are not permitted. You and UPS each waives the right to trial by jury. You and UPS further waive the ability to participate in a class, mass, consolidated or combined 
action or arbitration."

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
points.status: The UPS Technology Agreement states the last update being "Version UTA 10072022" (10/07/2022)

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
points.status: The UPS Technology Agreement states that "Either party may terminate this Agreement, and UPS may terminate any or all licenses to the UPS Technology granted hereunder, for convenience at any time upon written notice to the other party."
